sources.title: Penny Paradise
sources.description: A Liverpool tug boat captain finds he's won a fortune on the penny pools and it changes his life. However, after giving up his job and throwing a large expensive party, he discovers that he may not really have won after all.

metadata.Plot: A Liverpool tug boat captain finds he's won a fortune on the penny pools and it changes his life. However, after giving up his job and throwing a large expensive party, he discovers that he may not really have won after all.
metadata.Writer: Thomas Browne, Basil Dean, Walter Meade
metadata.Actors: Edmund Gwenn, Betty Driver, Jimmy O'Dea
